items.title: Score Vantrue’s N5S 4-channel 360-degree dash cam with up to 2.7K resolution at $320 (Reg. $400), more from $200
items.summary:
By way of the official Vantrue Amazon storefront, you can pick up the brand’s new N5S 4-Channel 360-Degree Dash Cam at $319.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page 20% off coupon, which happens to also match the price we’re seeing from the direct website. Normally going for $400 at full price since hitting the market in July, we’ve seen previous discounts go as low as $280, which was last seen during Black Friday sales in November. While it’s gone that low in the past, you’re still getting a solid $80 markdown here that marks the first of its 2026 discounts, landing it at the third-lowest price that we have tracked. As a cheaper alternative that still provides external and internal coverage of your vehicle, you can find the N4S 3-Channel Dash Cam system down at $199.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page 20% off coupon.

more…

items.title: Upgrade to 360-degree solar-charging security with Anker’s SoloCam S340 multi-cam kits starting from a $350 low
items.summary:
Through its official eufy Amazon storefront, Anker is offering its Security SoloCam S340 2-Cam Kit (with HomeBase 3) at $349.98 shipped, which happens to match the sale pricing we’re seeing directly from the brand’s website, while the more comprehensive 4-Cam Kit (with HomeBase 3) is down at $599.99 shipped, and also matching the price from the direct website. These two security packages carry $550 and $1,030 MSRPs, but you can more often find them starting around $500 and $900 on average, with discounts having taken the 2-cam kit to this same low price (last seen during Christmas sales) and the 4-cam kit to $550. That means you’re getting either an all-time low for the 2-cam setup or the second-best price for the 4-cam kit, courtesy of the $150 and $300 markdowns from the going rates ($200 and $430 off the MSRPs).

This 8-in-1 power strip is combines traditional outlets with Type-C and USB-A charging in one compact unit. The Type-C ports support up to 25W, which is enough for phones, tablets, and is almost as much as an official MacBook Air charger. items.title: Score up to $800 savings on Anker eufy E15 + E18 robot mowers with pure vision FSD cameras at new lows from $1,000
items.summary:
As part of its overall Valentine’s Day flash sale that is running through this week, we spotted Anker dropping new low prices on its eufy E15 Robot Lawn Mower for $999.99 shipped (matching in price at Amazon), while the more advanced E18 Robot Lawn Mower is down at $1,399.99 shipped (and also matching at Amazon). Coming down from their $1,800 and $2,000 MSRPs, we’ve mostly seen these models over the last year keeping between $1,300 and $1,400 for the E15 robot, while the E18 robot has kept between $1,500 and $1,600. Now, you’re able to grab them at the lowest prices we have tracked to date, courtesy of the $800 and $600 savings during this event. On their direct website pages, there are also bundle options to score blade replacement kits, as well.
